template.masthead: News for the Chaminade Ohana - December 2016 - Vol. 10

meta.og_twtr_desc: News and Events from the Chaminade Campus and Ohana.
meta.og_type_article_author: Office of University Communications and Marketing

content.title: Good Circulation
content.intro: School of Nursing's second annual mixer hosts community partners and offers seniors and alumni the opportunity to connect.

content.title: The World is Our Classroom
content.intro: Hogan Entrepreneurs Program students travel to India and China for a taste of global business and culture.

content.title: If You Build It, They Will Come
content.intro: The Environmental + Interior Design's Senior Portfolio Exhibit draws a crowd.

content.title: Crocheting for a Cause
content.intro: The Division of Humanities and Fine Arts weave compassion into coursework as students fabricate items for enlisted military families.

content.title: The Results Are In!
content.intro: Chaminade shines in key areas according to recent National Survey for Student Engagement (NSSE).

content.title: “All Things Marianist” Episode 4
content.intro: Bro. Thomas Jalbert, SM, shares the significance of our Marianist founders with Danny O'Regan.

content.title: Stand (and Walk) Together
content.intro: Sign up to participate in the Martin Luther King Jr. Parade and rally next month.

content.title: Spend Your Saturday in Service
content.intro: Register today for our university-wide Founders' Service Day project.
